it s one of my favorite hobbies.
I spend my days drawing, painting and making games that help animals in need.

content.text: I love drawing and painting too. I recently started to make some games to help animals in need.
That's so cool! What kind of games?
I've made a couple of matching games and a couple of simple puzzles. I want to do some more complex games in the future, but I'm still learning the software.
That's really impressive! I've always wanted to learn how to make games, but I just don't have the time.
It's never too late to learn! I taught myself using online tutorials.
I might have to look into that. I'd love to be able to make games to help animals.
That would be awesome! I'm sure you'd be great at it.
Thanks! I'm excited to give it a try.
Good luck! I'm sure you'll do great.
I love all animals, but if I had to choose one, it would be dogs.
They are! I love how loyal and loving they are.
Me too! They're the perfect companions.
